title: We Found 21 Cheap-But-Expensive-Looking Chairs at Walmart
text:
Photo: Courtesy of the Retailer

When you spend as much time combing the deep, dark depths of the online retail-sphere as we do, you sometimes learn surprising things about stores you thought you had all figured out. One such thing: Walmart carries a lot of expensive-looking accent chairs. And not just your standard Eames knockoffs, but some truly unique and stately options, including two from Drew Barrymore’s home line for the retailer. As we’ve also done with Amazon, we’ve rounded up all of our favorite accent chairs from Walmart here. Importantly, everything listed is $500 or less.

Novogratz Hudson Lounge Chair, Ocean Woven $162 (was $189, now 14% off) $162 at Walmart Buy

Noble House Sophie Blue Stripe Fabric Club Accent Chair $198 at Walmart Buy

Dorel Living Jaya Accent Chair, Beige $241 (was $289, now 17% off) $241 at Walmart Buy

Meridian Furniture Selena Upholstered Barrel Chair with Ottoman $201 at Walmart Buy

Modway Nutshell Leatherette Lounge Chair, White $223 (was $365, now 39% off) $223 at Walmart Buy

Safavieh Bandelier Arm Chair, Light Oak $225 (was $266, now 15% off) $225 at Walmart Buy

Noble House Patrick Modern Faux Leather Accent Chair, White $204 at Walmart Buy

Safavieh Johannes Bicast Leather Armchair $199 (was $487, now 59% off) $199 at Walmart Buy

Poly and Bark Trattoria Side Chair, Orange $50 (was $57, now 12% off) $50 at Walmart Buy

Best Choice Products Linen Tufted Accent Chair, Yellow $176 (was $291, now 40% off) $176 at Walmart Buy

Zimtown Mid-Century Retro Upholstered Tufted Chair $95 (was $152, now 38% off) $95 at Walmart Buy

Mid-Century Modern Linen Fabric Accent Chair, Light Grey $190 at Walmart Buy

Vintage Sun Mid-Century Accent Chair by Drew Barrymore Flower Home $319 (was $399, now 20% off) $319 at Walmart Buy

Vintage Palm Barrel Accent Chair by Drew Barrymore Flower Home $499 at Walmart Buy

MoDRN Sandpiper Upholstered Lounge Chair, Seaglass Aqua $399 at Walmart Buy

Flash Furniture Contemporary Faux Fur Swivel Recliner and Ottoman This one isn’t necessarily expensive-looking, but we had to include it. One half-expects the thing to scream and say the word of the day. Incidentally, it comes in other colors, including neon green. $207 at Walmart Buy

description: A roundup of cheap-but-expensive-looking accent chairs (in all shapes, sizes, and colors) at Walmart. Featuring selections from brands like Modway, Safavieh, Drew Barrymore’s Flower Home line, and more.
